note.p: Daughter of George Alexander Cumming of Henllan, Denbigh, Wales. Married William Henry Smith (d. 1872), a barrister, in 1861. Friend of John Price.
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 6 October 2020)
letters to John Price, 3 September [1881] and 27 December 1881
Census returns of England and Wales 1881 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG11/5530/89/7)
